https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iS9kkyMiRZgz0eSPvrtQUr5JTgf.jpg Grandpa goes on an expedition to the North Pole to find the last Polar Bears. He takes with him his pet dog Roef. Despite Storms, Howling Wolves and Continuous snowfall, they reach Walrus Baai, but then their adventure really starts. De Laatste Ijsberen
